The Same Game

Written & Directed by Carl W. Haynes III
Sorry, this is a Java Applet. You can't see it because you don't have a Java enabled browser.

How to play:

  1. The goal is to clear all the tiles
  2. You may only clear 2 or more tiles at a time
  3. Only tiles that are immediately adjacent to each other may be cleared
  4. Click on a tile, if it is eligible to be cleared, it and its neighbors will start to flash
  5. Click again to clear
Scoring works like this:
  • (n-2)^2 for each group of tiles cleared
  • final score is: score - number of uncleared tiles
  • score * 5 if you clear all the tiles
The source code.
